results.name: Binary weight of sigma(n).
comment: The sequence is considered in connection with A175522, A175524, A175526.
a(n)=1 if n is in A046528. - _Robert Israel_, Nov 07 2017
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
Index entries for sequences related to sums of divisors
example: a(4) = 3 because the divisors of 4 add up to 7, a number which in binary is written as 3 ones.
results.author: _Vladimir Shevelev_, Dec 03 2010
